core:value.core:name: Set Item Prices Error
core:value.core:description: Allow the task to be re-run or suspended. If the purchase order is interactive only the user that created it can re-run it. If the purchase order is automatic, any user (at the server's location) with the correct privilege can re-run it.
core:value.core:jobHeader: Set Purchase Order Item Prices Error (Purchase Order ID: #{purchaseOrderId})
